The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: ** PLEASE NOTE** This class suits in-class participation better to successfully enjoy this class and ondemand participation will be extremely limited to self-study
授業方法:
Classes will be conducted through English lectures. However, Documentaries, movies, music, and news articles will also be used as learning materials.

All classes are expected to be conducted on campus, face-to-face style. Google Classroom will be used for some course information and assignment submissions, and, also for any outside of class contact with the teacher.
